Uses of Package
com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software

  • Packages that use com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters
    The com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters package provides interfaces to manage desired state configuration and software for a cluster of ESX hosts.
    com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software
    The com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software package provides interfaces to manage desired state software for ESX cluster.
  • Classes in com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software used by com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters 
    Class and Description
    SoftwareFactory
    SoftwareFactory is responsible for creating instances of services contained inside the com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software package and also has the subpackages reference to access respective subpackage services.
  • Classes in com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software used by com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software 
    Class and Description
    AddOn
    The AddOn interface provides methods to manage desired OEM add-on specification for a given cluster.
    AddOn.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the AddOn#get vAPI operation.
    AddOnTypes
    The AddOn interface provides methods to manage desired OEM add-on specification for a given cluster.
    BaseImage
    The BaseImage interface provides methods to manage desired ESX base image.
    BaseImage.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the BaseImage#get vAPI operation.
    BaseImageTypes
    The BaseImage interface provides methods to manage desired ESX base image.
    Commits
    The Commits interface provides methods to manage committed changes to desired software document.
    Commits.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Commits#get vAPI operation.
    CommitsTypes
    The Commits interface provides methods to manage committed changes to desired software document.
    CommitsTypes.Info
    The Info class defines the information about software draft.
    CommitsTypes.Info.ApplyStatusType
    The ApplyStatusType class defines possible values regarding the application of this commit.
    CommitsTypes.Info.ApplyStatusType.Values
    Native Java enum representing this enumeration class.
    Compliance
    The Compliance interface provides methods to get the last software compliance result for an ESX cluster.
    Compliance.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Compliance#get vAPI operation.
    ComplianceTypes
    The Compliance interface provides methods to get the last software compliance result for an ESX cluster.
    Components
    The Components interface provides methods to get desired component specification for an ESX cluster.
    Components.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Components#get vAPI operation.
    Components.ListInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Components#list vAPI operation.
    ComponentsTypes
    The Components interface provides methods to get desired component specification for an ESX cluster.
    Drafts
    The Drafts interface provides methods to manage working copy of software documents.
    Drafts.CommitInvocation
    TaskInvocable that represents the Drafts#commit vAPI operation.
    Drafts.CreateInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Drafts#create vAPI operation.
    Drafts.DeleteInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Drafts#delete vAPI operation.
    Drafts.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Drafts#get vAPI operation.
    Drafts.ImportSoftwareSpecInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Drafts#importSoftwareSpec vAPI operation.
    Drafts.ListInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Drafts#list vAPI operation.
    Drafts.ScanInvocation
    TaskInvocable that represents the Drafts#scan vAPI operation.
    Drafts.ValidateInvocation
    TaskInvocable that represents the Drafts#validate vAPI operation.
    DraftsTypes
    The Drafts interface provides methods to manage working copy of software documents.
    DraftsTypes._VAPI_OPERATIONS
    Identifiers of the task operations
    DraftsTypes.CommitSpec
    The CommitSpec class contains properties that are used to create a new commit.
    DraftsTypes.CommitSpec.Builder
    Builder class for DraftsTypes.CommitSpec.
    DraftsTypes.FilterSpec
    The FilterSpec class contains properties used to filter the results when listing software drafts.
    DraftsTypes.FilterSpec.Builder
    Builder class for DraftsTypes.FilterSpec.
    DraftsTypes.ImportSpec
    The ImportSpec class defines the information used to import the desired software specification.
    DraftsTypes.ImportSpec.Builder
    Builder class for DraftsTypes.ImportSpec.
    DraftsTypes.Info
    The Info class defines the information about software draft.
    DraftsTypes.Metadata
    The Metadata class defines the metadata information about software draft.
    DraftsTypes.SourceType
    The SourceType enumeration class defines possible values of sources to import software specification.
    DraftsTypes.SourceType.Values
    Native Java enum representing this enumeration class.
    DraftsTypes.StatusType
    The StatusType enumeration class defines possible values of status of a software draft.
    DraftsTypes.StatusType.Values
    Native Java enum representing this enumeration class.
    DraftsTypes.Summary
    The Summary class defines the summary information about software draft.
    DraftsTypes.ValidateResult
    The ValidateResult class contains properties to describe result of validation of desired software specification.
    EffectiveComponents
    The EffectiveComponents interface provides methods to get effective list of components.
    EffectiveComponents.ListInvocation
    Invocable that represents the EffectiveComponents#list vAPI operation.
    EffectiveComponentsTypes
    The EffectiveComponents interface provides methods to get effective list of components.
    HardwareSupport
    The HardwareSupport interface provides methods to manage a cluster's Hardware Support Package (HSP) configuration.
    HardwareSupport.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the HardwareSupport#get vAPI operation.
    HardwareSupportTypes
    The HardwareSupport interface provides methods to manage a cluster's Hardware Support Package (HSP) configuration.
    Recommendations
    The Recommendations interface provides methods to manage the generation and retrieval of recommended image specs.
    Recommendations.GenerateInvocation
    TaskInvocable that represents the Recommendations#generate vAPI operation.
    Recommendations.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Recommendations#get vAPI operation.
    RecommendationsTypes
    The Recommendations interface provides methods to manage the generation and retrieval of recommended image specs.
    RecommendationsTypes._VAPI_OPERATIONS
    Identifiers of the task operations
    RecommendationsTypes.ExplanationDetails
    The ExplanationDetails class contains properties to describe the result of validation of desired software specification.
    RecommendationsTypes.FilterSpec
    The FilterSpec class contains properties used to filter the generated recommendations (see Recommendations.generate(java.lang.String)) based on a specified base image version.
    RecommendationsTypes.FilterSpec.Builder
    Builder class for RecommendationsTypes.FilterSpec.
    RecommendationsTypes.Info
    The Info class defines the information about the most recent recommendation generation result.
    RecommendationsTypes.Info.Builder
    Builder class for RecommendationsTypes.Info.
    SoftwareFactory
    SoftwareFactory is responsible for creating instances of services contained inside the com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software package and also has the subpackages reference to access respective subpackage services.
    Solutions
    The Solutions interface provides methods to manage desired software solution specifications for an ESX cluster.
    Solutions.DeleteInvocation
    TaskInvocable that represents the Solutions#delete vAPI operation.
    Solutions.GetInvocation
    Invocable that represents the Solutions#get vAPI operation.
    Solutions.ListInvocation

    TaskInvocable that represents the Solutions#set vAPI operation.

    Identifiers of the task operations
